|stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL2+ |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.11.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = AR7516 |manuf_rev = VW22-A-J6 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2017 |fccapprovdate = 11/24/2010 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B005584W2E |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9223; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM: [[Arcadyan]] AR7516VW22-A-J6 *CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 50810 EL (XWAY ARX168) @333 MHz SoC AR9 :ADSL2+ CPE Solution for Router and Gateway Applications *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wbmr-hp-g300h ''Buffalo WBMR-HP-G300H'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] 
Architecture:	MIPS 34Kc
Vendor:         Lantiq
Bootloader:	U-Boot 1.00
System-On-Chip:	Lantiq AR9
CPU:            Lantiq PSB 50810
Speed:  	333MHz
Flash:  	32MB
RAM:	        64MB
Wireless:       Atheros AR9280 Rev:2
Ethernet:       4x GbE Atheros AR8316
Modem:	        Lantiq ADSL2+
USB:	        Yes, 1x 2.0 (driver dwc_otg)
Serial:	        Yes
JTAG:	        Yes
:Per the DD-WRT router database, this device has 32MB Flash. ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/buffalo/buffalo_wbmr-hp-g300h |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wbmr-hp-g300h |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=34072 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = lantiq |subtarget = xway |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = For Annex A, use a-image. (for 17.01.2: at NETWORK -> INTERFACES -> DSL you have to change Annex A to Annex B! Don't change the firmware file, because this one is already correct! }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
